title: Eco-Modern Home with Contemporary Flair in Pila’s Trendy Suburb
description: Experience modern eco-conscious living in this spacious 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom house, perfectly situated in Suburb, Pila. Spanning a generous 175 sqm, this contemporary home seamlessly blends sustainable technology with comfort, including underfloor heating, large double-glazed windows to maximize natural light, and an inviting open-plan dining area. Designed for a modern lifestyle, enjoy access to a refreshing swimming pool and a separate co-working space ideal for remote work or creative endeavors. An outdoor barbecue zone makes this home perfect for entertaining and enjoying the fresh air.
neighborhood_description: Suburb is a dynamic yet laid-back community designed for those who value green spaces and an active outdoor lifestyle. Right around the corner, you'll find local cafés, dining hotspots, artisan shops, and easy access to jogging and cycling routes. Convenient nearby highway access ensures simple connections to central Pila and other parts of Greater Poland.
lifestyle_benefits: community of fellow expats and dynamic locals
great jogging and biking paths nearby
spaces conducive to working and relaxing
quiet nights with stars visible in low urban lights
target_buyer: Perfect for expats and remote professionals seeking a modern, eco-friendly home with space for work and relaxation, within close reach of city amenities yet immersed in nature.
market_positioning: This property is a rare find in the Pila region, uniquely positioned to attract eco-conscious internationals and Polish returnees desiring a sustainable yet stylish home with modern features. It offers a blend of peaceful, green living—together with up-to-date amenities and work-from-home flexibility—within an up-and-coming suburban locale.
